Title: Establishes a social worker pilot program
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of mental health to establish up to three, three-year pilot programs in community behavioral health organizations for the purposes of creating social worker pilot programs to support the ongoing retention and recruitment of licensed clinical social workers.
LawCode: Add ยง7.49, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing a social worker pilot program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
